questions.question_text: Which of the following is NOT an AWS Shared Responsibility Model devised by AWS?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
Answer is D, CND Book P.1583

choices.B: Shared Responsibility Model for Infrastructure Services

questions.question_text: Docker provides Platform-as-a-Service (PaaS) through ________ and delivers containerized software packages.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Answer is C, CND Book P.1478

questions.question_text: Mark is monitoring the network traffic on his organization's network. He wants to detect TCP and UDP ping sweeps on his network. Which type of filter will be used to detect this?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
CMP ping sweep icmp.type==8 or icmp.type==0 nmap -sn -PE <subnet>
TCP ping sweeps tcp.dstport==7 nmap -sn -PS/-PA <subnet>
UDP ping sweeps udp.dstport==7 nmap -sn -PU <subnet>

Selected Answer: D
To detect TCP and UDP ping sweeps on the network, you would typically use the following filter:

D. tcp.srcport==7 and udp.srcport==7

This filter checks for packets with a source port of 7 (which is often used for the "echo" service, commonly associated with ping-like functionality) for both TCP and UDP traffic. Ping sweeps are attempts to discover live hosts on a network by sending echo requests (ping) to multiple IP addresses, and they can use either TCP or UDP packets with the appropriate source and destination ports.

Selected Answer: D
LAPS is the last microsoft solution

Windows Local Administrator Password Solution (Windows LAPS)
LAPS creates a password or individual administrator accounts and stroes them in the AD

D. LAPS(Local Administrstor Password solution)
